mapper.select: select t.gameType,t.`no`,t.`description`,t.amount,t.shareTotal -IFNULL(t1.amount,0) as shareTotal from ( select od.gameType,od.numbers as `no`,od.gameDesc as`description`,sum(od.amount) as amount , (CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.amount ELSE 0 END )AS shareTotal , od.odds,od.oddset FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN Handicap on od.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN user u on u.id = od.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIND_IN_SET(od.gameType,#{p_gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND (CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.userid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE 1=1 END ) AND (od.orderType is null or orderType='xiazhu' or (od.orderType='bucang' AND od.userId !=#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) GROUP BY od.gameType,od.numbers,od.gameDesc ) t left JOIN (SELECT gameType,od1.numbers,SUM(amount) as Amount from orderdetail od1 where od1.UserId=#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.HandicapId=#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.orderType='bucang' group by od1.gameType,od1.numbers ) as t1 on t.gameType=t1.gameType and t.`no`=t1.numbers order by shareTotal DESC LIMIT #{p_start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{p_pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) as orderNum,t.shareTotal -IFNULL(t1.amount,0) as amount,0 AS buhuo from ( select od.gameType, sum(CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.amount ELSE 0 END ) as shareTotal , od.odds,od.oddset FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN Handicap on od.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN user u on u.id = od.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIND_IN_SET(od.gameType,#{p_gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.userid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE 1=1 END ) GROUP BY od.gameType ) t left JOIN (SELECT gameType,od1.numbers,SUM(amount) as Amount from orderdetail od1 where od1.UserId=#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.HandicapId=#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.orderType='bucang' group by od1.gameType ) as t1 on t.gameType=t1.gameType

select cc.category,sum(IFNULL(zhancheng,0))-IFNULL(t1.Amount,0) as zhancheng FROM categoryconfig cc left JOIN( select od.gameType,(CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongamt WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.amount ELSE 0 END )AS zhancheng FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN orders on orders.Id = od.orderId INNER JOIN Handicap on orders.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN user u on u.id = orders.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (CASE WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=1 THEN od.dagudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} =2 then od.gudongid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=3 then od.zongdaiid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=4 then od.dailiamt when #{p_usertype,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}=5 then od.userid=#{p_userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE 1=1 END ) ) t on cc.gametype = t.gametype left JOIN (SELECT gameType,SUM(amount) as Amount from orderdetail od1 where od1.UserId=#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.HandicapId=#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND od1.orderType='bucang' group by od1.gameType ) as t1 on cc.gameType=t1.gameType GROUP BY cc.category
